name: Balls in Holes (Josh Walker)
description:
This is a golf game! Play golf and have fun : )

It was originally being made in 48 hours for the Kenney Game Jam 2021, and the theme was rotation! I didn't manage to submit in time so I kept on developing!

I spent less than a week developing the game by myself, with the exception of the levels, which my friend (https://itch.io/profile/lordgarold) designed.

Most of the assets are by Kenney (https://kenney.nl/assets) but the music is "Lofi Hip Hop" from omfgdude (https://opengameart.org/users/omfgdude), and the sound effects are from freesound.org and opengameart.org.
